resources.string: By default is parsed from APK version. You can change it, but you shouldn\'t need too.
When this version is lower than Current Version update will be forced after restart.
When one of Excluded Version matches with Current Version update will be forced.
Your version is %1$s, please update to %2$s to be able using this app again.
When this version is lower than Current Version update will be offered after restart.
